Articles.Content:
Since nobody listened to the rules of the IKLC, it is now filled with random spam. Therefore, I have opened this new thread that will act as a dictionary for the IKLC. The old thread, which can be found here:http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/showthread.php/21753-The-IKLC-%28International-Kerbin-Language-Comittee%29 Is now a general IKLC thread (language rules and word patterns can be found here)

WORDS HERE, ONLY!!!

Scripts:

The most scientific script around. Feel all futuristic with this technological text.

Numbers and numerical system:

This works in the same way that Roman Numerals do.

In the font:

0=0

1=1

2=5

3=10

4=100

5=1000

6=million

7=billion

8=trillion

9=quadrillion

Edited October 10, 2012 by Whptheenah
